thread.title: 'He has not met his son': Jeremy McConnell exposed after 'claiming he met Caben and Stephanie Davis in an emotional reunion'
thread.title_full: 'He has not met his son': Jeremy McConnell exposed after 'claiming he met Caben and Stephanie Davis in an emotional reunion'

author: mirror
title: 'He has not met his son': Jeremy McConnell exposed after 'claiming he met Caben and Stephanie Davis in an emotional reunion'
text:
Thank you for subscribing!   
Deadbeat dad Jeremy McConnell has been exposed after friends say he has NOT met his baby son - despite 'pals' giving a gushing interview about their bond. 
It is the second time the Irish reality star has been caught out about seeing his child, who was born on January 13, after trying to dupe fans on Sunday with a picture taken from mum Stephanie Davis ' private Facebook account. 
Sources close to Jeremy's camp expressed disbelief today that the star would claim he met Caben-Albi, when he was nowhere his baby."It is so bizarre that Jeremy seems to think he has met his baby, nothing could be further from the truth. Jeremy pictured in London last week (Photo: WENN.com) Jeremy shared this picture of Caben-Albi (Photo: Instagram/Stephanie Davis) 
"We know that Jeremy really wants to meet his son, but to tell a national newspaper he has seems a little odd. 
"We can only think Jeremy wants to bolster his image as a decent dad - but this isn't the right way to do it." 
Steph has previously said she has no objection to her ex, who she met in CBB , having a relationship with Caben. 
Yesterday sources close to Jeremy told The Sun: â€œIt was an emotional reunion between him and Stephanie but close pals were glad to see the pair finally putting their past behind him." Jeremy reportedly flew to Liverpool for the meeting (Photo: WENN.com) 
The alleged meeting came a week after Jeremy confirmed he was the father of Stephanie's baby, after initially questioning his paternity. 
It was originally thought Jez had met the baby over the weekend, when he shared an adorable picture of Caben-Albi to social media. 
Fans immediately thought he had taken it himself, but Jeremy actually posted the picture after he took it from ex Stephanie 's private social media account. 
A source close to Jeremy said at the time they were in discussions about the future but admitted his post was very misleading as he definitely hadn't met his newborn son. Jezza celebrates the news Stephanie Davis and Jeremy McConnell met in CBB last year (Photo: Stephanie Davis / Twitter) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
